{{Quote|I could sing the praises of the countless gorgeous maidens in the Court of Fontaine, ethereal as the clouds themselves...|[[Xavier]]}}
The '''Court of Fontaine''' is the court of the [[Hydro Archon]], established at least a thousand years ago. It is in charge of [[The Steambird]], a newspaper read all across [[Teyvat]].

The Court of Fontaine is known for its beautiful maidens.<ref name="tatara">{{Ref/Quest|Tatara Tales (Quest)}}</ref> The [[Sojourner]], a harpist who would later join the [[Wanderer's Troupe]], was beloved by the women of the Court of Fontaine, and when he left without saying goodbye, the ladies of the Court wept.<ref>{{Ref/Weapon|The Stringless}}</ref>

==Trivia==
* This name could refer to a specific legal court in [[Fontaine]], or possibly the nation as a whole.
